Our Location

We are centrally located, providing easy access to the city's top attractions.

The Central Park Hotel

123 Park Avenue
New York, NY 10001

  • City Center 0 kilometers
  • Main Shopping District 2 miles
  • The Grand Museum 2.50 miles
  • Historic Old Town 2.50 miles
  • City Convention Center 4 miles
  • LaGuardia Airport (LGA) 8 miles
  • John F. Kennedy Airport (JFK) 15 miles
